officialTitle: Effects of Oral Steroid in Mycoplasma Pneumoniae Pneumonia With Lobar Consolidation or Pleural Effusion in Children
inclusionCriteria:
* Evidence of Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection
* Lobar pneumonia or pneumoniae with pleural effusion
* Must have maximum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Immunosuppresant host
* Chronic cardiovascular/pulmonary disease
* Hospital acquired infection
